title: I am disconnected...
body:
Right now I'm in--game (supposedly).
During the loading screen I disconnected but when the internet came back on I just couldn't reconnect anymore 
it keeps telling me to check my connection which, since I'm writing this post, is absolutely fine.
This has happened a few times already

Can anyone help?

replies.body: If you haven't been able to get reconnected with League there must be something blocking your network from reaching the servers somehow. I'd go through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as usual to check for the basics first, but also make sure that there aren't any possible firewall or antivirus blocking that connection.
